list.description:
ZTZ-96/ZTZ-96A | TYPE-96/TYPE-96A Digital Gunner Sight
Originally made by BarteG98PL for T64A but this perfectly works for ZTZ96 and ZTZ96A. I made some minor changes to suit my preference but you can edit stuff at your own will.
#ZTZ96
#ZTZ96A
#TYPE96
My first sight ever for the Amx-40! (Distance lines are up to 4.5 km!)

Schindibee's fictional missile sight for M113A1 TOW

#customsight #sight #fictional #m113 #m113a1 #tow #m113_tow

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian and Chinese M113A1 TOW ATGM carriers:

The sight features a simple crosshair with a basic stadiametric rangefinder (helpful to quickly estimate distance to target) in the form of vertical lines: The lines have the height of a typical tank (2.5 meters) at a certain distance (400, 800, 1600 and 3200 meters) and are positioned so that they can measure the tank's hulls (length 7 meters).

The sight also shows the visible area when zoomed

Universal Anti-Aircraft sight

#AA #SPAA #air #antiair #antiaircraft #anti_air #anti_aircraft #sight #crosshair #circle #fictional

Hello, this is my first sight ever made and I'm pretty glad how it turned out.
Works well for me, no matter on what BR I'am playing. The area between the 2 big circles works great when shooting at a plane passing you at the range of ~600-700 meters (at average speed). Obviously jets need a little more adjustment :)
I highly recommend you just testing how the ranging works on a test drive. I think it will be updated if needed.
Installing instructions are in the dow

A sight for the sherman calliope for shooting with rockets.

ALL CREDIT GOES TO Prez1d3nt

Using Prez1d3nt's m1a1 abrams FCS files I made it work with m1a2

Make sure that you go to controls-Mouse wheel (tank) and set it to sight distance control, then go to Mouse wheel multiplier (tank) and set it to 20%

#m1a2 #abrams #fcs #freedom

Link to the original: https://live.warthunder.com/post/793092/en/

Let me know if there are any problems with it I might try to fix it

P.S. If you ( Prez1d3nt ) are reading this and want it removed contact me on discord MaTT#1891

UPDATED 03/24/2020 Fixed issue of sig...

#otomatic#6k
I actually tried to add up to 10 k, but 6k max range is scripted(.

SIGHT IS FOR 1440p

It seems _ZoliWorks_ is done so I have taken the time to fix the critical problem of the ranging placement. The original sights broke at some point and moved the ranging result to far to the left so it over laps with the "DIST" text and is unreadable. Still _ZoliWorks_ work just minor modification/update by me. I will also re-upload all the other M1 series sights with fixed ranging placement.

See here for original creator and sights: https://live.warthunder.com/user/_ZoliWorks_/

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight for Vickers Mk.7

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #vickers #vickers_mk7

This is a fully fictional sight for the British Vickers Mk.7 MBT, optimized for AB and RB battles (limited usefulness for Sim, as parralax not taken into account) including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for APFSDS ammo, for distances up to 6'400m

- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)

- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer) perpendi

Fictional, simple and clean sight for the VT1-2's DM13 or DM23 Rounds, accounting for the secondary gun's spacing to assist in aiming.

The sight only works for the APFSDS Rounds and NOT the DM12 HEAT Round.

The sight has aiming reticules from 200m to 2800m for the secondary gun. To aim at intervals between provided ranges, place the target along the diagonal between each circle (eg. firing at 1000m will be between the 800m and 1200m circles)

Thanks for using my sight! Feedback is greatly appreciated :)

#germany #vt1 #vt12 #vt1_2 #twoguns

#customsight #sight #fictional #buteo #sweden #sav #sav_201248 #sav_fm48

This is a fully fictional sight for the brand new Swedish SAV 20.12.48 tank destroyer (Tier 2 Permium), including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Common ranging scale (chevron style) for ABCBC and HE ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for ABCBC and HE ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angl

Have fun....

Historical gunner sight for ROLAND 1 & 2.
Can be used with FlaRakPz 1 Roland 2 and AMX-30 Roland 1.
#flarakpz1 #flarakpz_1 #amx_30_roland_1 #roland #historical

I made the sight as historically accurate as possible with the current means that are available for custom sights.
Normally all elements of the reticle would be yellow and transparent.
The protractor in the top left corner would dynamically indicate the current elevation of the sight.
Since this is not possible to simulate currently (to my knowledge) it is static.
The different symbols on the bottom (^, |, ||) would turn on and off d

Leopard 2 EMES15 day sight pack

Elements of the reticle have realistic angular sizes.

Version 2021.03.14
- Compatible with 2.5.0.23
- Added to Leopard 2PL

Version 2021.02.05
- Compatible with 2.3.0.85
- Available in two versions: with and without realistic FOV limit of 5 degrees

Sources:
- kotsch88.de
- Steel Beasts 4

#kuloodporny #leopard2 #realistic #semirealistic #german #germany #leopard2a4 #leopard2a5
#optic #sight #sights #crosshair #fcs

250m Special Collimator/Sight for the Ju 87 Stuka G-1 and G-2.
The sight was made to help you to destroy Ivan's tanks. Based on my experience, it is much more useful than the Revi 16 for this specific task. I've destroyed around 3000 ground targets in SB, and around 1500 with Ju 87 G-1 and G-2. I made this sight after destroying 1300 tanks, and the last 200 were much easier to aim with this collimator.

How to use
It's adjusted at 250m, so you must adjust your Guns targeting distance (m) at 250m.
The horizontal red line shows the height of the shot's trajectory, also it helps you to be aligned

file.name: Special Collimator Ju 87 G by Sinnlichkeit.zip

list.description:
Jagdpanther interactive sight for Simulator battles, based on mechanical cam profile

Another experiment of mine incorporating some mechanical engineering stuff in it.

Sight is supposed to counter the unwanted parallax effect because of gun barrel and optic sight offset.

Sight distance control must be used with this sight!

Cam profile based splines rotate when adjusting range using sight distance control. There are two (three) cam profile splines in this custom sight. One for aiming point adjustment (countering parallax), another (two) is for rangefinding. Both depend on sight distance cont

file.name: Jagdpanther cam profile sight for SB.zip

list.description:
Schindibee's fictional "BUTEO" Sight for M26A1 and M36B1

#customsight #sight #fictional #buteo #m26a1 #m36b1

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian M26A1 and M36B1, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for M82 APCBC ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for M82 APCBC ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HE, APCR (2x) and Coaxial MG ammo (right scales)

Installa

#customsight #sight #fictional #xm_1 #xm_1_gm #xm1 #buteo

This is a fully fictional sight for the Premium XM-1 GM (USA), including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for APFSDS ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for APFSDS ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for Smoke and Coaxial MG ammo (right scales)
